Texts.Chs: 卡达文大逃亡后，我们试图寻找一个新的世界定居。 但是，每当我们找到合适的行星时，特尔提勒就会到达并攻击舰队。 我们总是被特尔提勒猎手——厄拉斯迈尔（Errasmeyr）猎杀，因此注定要像游牧民族一样生活在星空之中。
Texts.Eng: After the Exodus from Kadavan, we tried to find a new world to settle on. But every time we found a suitable planet, the Theleans would arrive and attack the fleet. We are always hunted by the Errasmeyr, the Thelean hunters, and so destined to live as nomads amongst the stars.

Texts.Chs: 阿威坎历史 —— 第七部分
我们不确定我们留下的那些人的命运。 有时，我们会收到来自卡达文的微弱信号，使我们相信抵抗力量仍然存在，但我们无法确信。 现在，在82 AF，我们进入了一个全新的银河系，并以惊人的速度遇到了新的外星种族。
Texts.Eng: We are not certain of the fate of those we left behind. From time to time, we receive faint signals from Kadavan, leading us to believe that the resistance is still alive, but we cannot be certain. Now, in the year 82 AF, we have arrived in a completely new sector of the galaxy, and are meeting new alien races at an alarming rate.

Texts.Chs: 再次前进以保持在厄拉斯迈尔之前，我们在补给的行星上留下了微型的殖民地。 我们是否能够找到新家，或者像许多人的希望一样回到卡达文，那些是我无法确定的事情。 但我确实知道，我们会继续为生存而战，而我们提升者的遗物，也将永远留在我们身边。
Texts.Eng: We leave behind small colonies on the planets where we resupply, before we move along again to stay ahead of the Errasmeyr. If we will ever find a new home, or return to Kadavan as so many hope we will, is something I can't know for certain. But I do know that we will continue to fight for our survival, and that the relics of our Uplifters will forever stay with us.
